name: Emotiscope Octave
description: CENTER-ORIGIN chromatic visualization. Pitch classes radiate from center. Position gradient shows distance from center, chromagram provides pitch energy data for audio reactivity.
artistic_intent: Center-origin mandate compliant. Maps 12 musical notes (C-B) based on distance from center. Quieter center (black), energetic edges (colored by pitch). Real-time harmonic visualization.

nodes.description: CENTER-ORIGIN: distance from center (0=dark center, 1=bright edges)
Map 12 pitch classes to position for audio reactivity
Color based on center-origin position + chromagram energy
